question: i was considering having hair extensions put in,but was wondering if my wudhu would be accepted as the hair is stuck on with hair glue
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER

At the outset, we wish to point out that hair extension is Haraam (strictly prohibited).

Rasulullah (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, ?Allah curses the Waasilah (person who extends hair) and the Mustawsilah (person who seeks to extend hair).? (Bukhari)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
